benchmark_details.name: MoleculeQA: A Dataset to Evaluate Factual Accuracy in Molecular Comprehension
benchmark_details.overview: MoleculeQA is a novel question answering dataset which possesses 62K QA pairs over 23K molecules, designed to evaluate factual accuracy in molecular comprehension.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for evaluating the accuracy of large language models in molecular comprehension and factual accuracy.

data.source: Constructed from authoritative molecular description corpus and includes QA pairs generated through a taxonomy-guided process.
data.annotation: Manual annotation by experts and automated methods.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is defined as the ratio of correct predictions to the total number of QA pairs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better comprehension of molecular knowledge.
methodology.validation: Evaluated by domain experts to ensure quality.
